H0.text: In which year was the 50p coin introduced into circulation in Britain. 1970

H1.text: In which year was the 50p coin introduced into circulation in Britain. 1971

H2.text: In which year was the 50p coin introduced into circulation in Britain. 1968

H3.text: In which year was the 50p coin introduced into circulation in Britain. 1969

A4.text: In October 1969, the 50p coin was introduced, with the 10s. note withdrawn on 20 November 1970.
